# CameraRegionProvider.Error.Code

**Enumeration**

Enumeration of all possible camera region error codes.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Code
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **CameraRegionProvider.Error.Code.addAnchorFailed**: Adding a camera region anchor failed.
- **CameraRegionProvider.Error.Code.anchorLimitReached**: Adding a camera region anchor failed - an upper limit was reached for this specific camera enhancement type.
- **CameraRegionProvider.Error.Code.removeAnchorFailed**: Removing a camera region anchor failed.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of the code.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
